---
title: "News Api"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(newsanchor)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
```

```{r}
afd <- get_everything(query = "AfD", language = "de")

afd_df <- afd$results_df %>% as_tibble()
```

```{r}
afd_df %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  tally() %>%
  ggplot(aes(reorder(name, n),n)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() +
  ggthemes::theme_hc() +
  labs(x=NULL, y=NULL)
```

```{r}
afd_df$title
```
